contest-event.event-date:
March 7, 1971 D Mossley Contest
Mossley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
mossley-contest
None
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
George Lawton Hall, Mossley Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5 and trophy. Best march - Stalybridge. Best soprano - Edwin Bull (Lancashire Constabulary). Best horn and euphonium - Lockwood. Best trombone - Christ Church. 6 bands competed.
April 9, 2012, 11:17 a.m. June 18, 2016, 12:52 p.m.
1 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Harry S. Brennand
2 Stalybridge Old Band Unknown
3 Linthwaite Silver Band Unknown
Unknown Result Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough
Unknown Result Christ Church (Bradford) Silver Unknown
Unknown Result Hade Edge Unknown
